title: BMCR18
description: Sealing Station locking cylinder failed to open completely when machine was stoped.
reasons_remedies: The sealing unit locking cylinders are not operated. The read switches are not operated for the sealing unit lock confirmation.
Check and confirm the read switch is on.
Check and confirm no obstacle in the cylinder movement and correct alignment.
text_for_embedding:
Error Code BMCR18
Error Code 18
Category: BMCR
Title: BMCR18
Alarm Message: Sealing Station Unlock Fail
Description: Sealing Station locking cylinder failed to open completely when machine was stoped.
Reason & Remedy:
1. The sealing unit locking cylinders are not operated. The read switches are not operated for the sealing unit lock confirmation.
2. Check and confirm the read switch is on.
3. Check and confirm no obstacle in the cylinder movement and correct alignment.
Visual References:
- sealing Station Top Cylinder
- sealing Station Top Cylinder
- sealing Station Top Cylinder
